line_1: Gripes fast the Wretch, and gives the killing Bruise.
line_2: Resolv'd the Stag his fixt Design pursues,

line_1: While the safe Urchin mocks his weaker Bruise.
line_2: With angry Jaws th' ungrateful Morsel chews,

line_1: They perish by the slightest bruise;
line_2: Proud of strong limbs and painted hues,

line_1: An Iron Rod shall find to bruise.
line_2: Nor, to avert thy Justice, sues.
